title: Ryan Reynolds serenades Hugh Jackman with a high pitched cheeky birthday song
text:
He's one of the biggest stars in Hollywood.

And on Saturday, Australian actor Hugh Jackman celebrated his 51st birthday.

Marking his friend's milestone anniversary, Ryan Reynolds serenaded the Australian star with a cheeky birthday song the next day.

'I was going to wish you a happy birthday then I saw what you said': Ryan Reynolds (pictured) serenaded Hugh Jackman with a cheeky song for his 51st in an Instagram video Saturday

Taking to his social media, Hugh wrote: 'At first I thought - Ugh, now I have to actually apologize. But then,' alongside a clip of Ryan.

'Hello Hugh, I was just going to wish you a happy birthday... and then I saw what you said, and in a word... hurtful, enjoy the show.. Hugh Jackman' Ryan said in the video.

The Deadpool star then began to start singing Happy Birthday.

Birthday tribute: The 42-year-old Canadian took to his own Instagram account to wish Hugh a cheeky birthday message, putting a cake sticker over the Wolverine's star's face

He concluded the clip saying: 'And I'm not f**king professionally trained you Jackman you piece of sh*t.'

The 42-year-old Canadian took to his own Instagram account to wish Hugh a cheeky birthday message, putting a cake sticker over the Wolverine's star's face.

Hugh hit back re-posting the birthday snap with an animation of Judge Judy Sheindlin rolling her eyes on top of Ryan's face.

Hit back! Hugh re-posted the birthday snap with an animated gif of Judge Judy Sheindlin rolling her eyes on top of Ryan's face.

Earlier in the day, the Greatest Showman star shared a photo of him holding a cupcake, and thanked fans for the sweet birthday messages.

'Thank you for ALL the awesome birthday messages,' he captioned the snap.

Meanwhile, The X-Men favourite has had an on-going comedic 'feud' with fellow superhero actor.

'Thank you for ALL the awesome birthday messages': Earlier in the day, Hugh Jackman (pictured) star shared a photo of him holding a cupcake, and thanked fans for their messages

Back in September, Pokémon Detective Pikachu star ruined took the opportunity to offer a gushing congratulations to Hugh Jackman after the Wolverine star was awarded with the Order of Australia in Canberra.

Re-posting a photo of Hugh after his win, Ryan joked: 'Hugh is one of the finest, kindest, hardest working, generous and most talented people...None of this changes the unfortunate fact he's a complete bastard.'

Jokers: The X-Men favourite has had an on-going comedic 'feud' with fellow superhero actor

Hugh and Ryan have been comedic adversaries for a few years, with Ryan often gently taking the mickey out of Hugh on Twitter, and vice-versa.

Hugh recently ribbed Ryan him by inviting him to a party and falsely telling him it was a sweater bash.

'These f***ing a******* said it was a sweater party,' Ryan wrote on social media in a shot alongside his rival as well as fellow A-lister, Jake Gyllenhaal, 38.
description: He's one of the biggest stars in Hollywood.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
